name: Crystal Compulsion
description:
Crystal Compulsion is a fast, deep, and unique deckbuilding roguelike. Craft a killer deck by converting, devouring, or killing all that stand in your way. Find the synergies between the current 150+ cards, climb the 12 ascension levels, and battle the cute but deadly animal creatures.

Features

  • Party / deckbuilding
  • Roguelike Replayability
  • Two gameplay modes, Convert or Devour the opposition
  • Many strategies between unit, building, artifact, leveling, card selection, and upgrade choices.
